text: Yaakov Neeman ( , 16 September 1939 - 1 January 2017) was an Israeli lawyer and academic. He was born in Tel Aviv. Neeman served as Minister of Justice in 1996 and again from 2009 through 2013.New government sworn in Ynetnews, 31 March 2009 He also served as Minister of Finance from 1997 through 1998. He was also professor of law at the Bar-Ilan University. Neeman died on 1 January 2017 in Jerusalem, aged 77.Former Justice Minister Yaakov Neeman passes away, Israel National News, 1 January 2017 ==References== ==Other websites== *Herzog, Fox & Neeman *Knesset Website Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:Academics of Bar-Ilan University Category:Lawyers from Tel Aviv Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Politicians from Tel Aviv
title: Yaakov Neeman
